sub_title: Global Continuous Improvement Lead | Supply Chain | Distribution | Logistics | Project Management | Foreign Trade Management
summary: Professional career developed in Operations, focusing on the areas of Supply Chain and Logistics, Customer Service, Foreign Trade and Project Management. Experience with Global Distribution, Continuous Improvement projects, Supply Chain and Logistics in Latin America and Europe (The Netherlands). Fluent English and Spanish

education.field_of_study: Master in Supply Chain Management & Logistics

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the Continuous Improvement in the Global Distribution Centre focused on Nutritional Products in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Excellence & Innovation Expert

profile_positions.description:
- Support S&OP roll out for Nutrition business in Latin America, and responsible for improvement strategy  implementation.

- Support and guide continuous improvement for Foreign Trade area in Latin America, acting as a business partner.

Responsible for Trading management projects and supporting project Business Cases preparation related to improvement projects focused at supply chain tactics, targeted at balancing inventory, lead times, supply and synergies.

- Leading KPI's Standardization in Latin America according to global strategy for Nutrition business and cross functional projects.

- Acting as Change management for Supply chain and Business challenging open mindset into all organization.

- Facilitating Workshops focused on process mapping based on lean and Kaizen methodologies.
profile_positions.title: Continuous Improvement Coordinator Latin America

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for driving supply chain performance in the region for all DNP to world class and acting as advisor, project coordinator, and team member to develop standards, KPI’s, trainings and special programs (such as DICI and S&Op/ IBP) in support of Latam supply chain organization and to enable the delivery of the DNP growth and ROCE strategic targets through a project and continuous improvement methodology.

Responsible for management projects and supporting project Business Cases preparation related to improvement projects focused at supply chain tactics, targeted at balancing inventory, lead times, supply and synergies.

Establishing objectives and define projects scope, goals, deliverable, costs, timescales, plans, dependencies, resource requirements and milestones. Responsible to OTIF Harmonization project for LATAM region, standardizing the indicator On time in full to all Latin America according to global guidance.

Facilitating roll-out in LATAM to S&OP projects, orchestrating training, events, and communication to promote Lean and agile approach to identify opportunities to improvement. Working as interface between project team and business team, prepare regular communication plan.

Responsible to Co-develop and evaluate supply chain roadmap performance with the regions (monthly) and with Corporate Operations (quarterly), track progress towards business case and Managing Supply chain KPI's.
profile_positions.title: Continuous Improvement Specialist Latin America

profile_positions.description:
Structuring, processes's implementation in the ​​Supply Chain, logisticsand Purchasing, through continuous improvement and Lean project, considering cost analysis and operation efficiency.

Development of new suppliers and partners in the supply chain, finished product and transportation Brazil / Singapore.

Coordination and follow-up of the entire Supply Chain, logistics and procurement operation, with suppliers in Brazil and suppliers in Singapore.

Procedures's creation of logistics processes, Supply Chain and purchase (processes of purchase of raw material, processes of assembly of the final product, finished product, transportation, import process, customs procedures and taxes - Brazil / Singapore.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Identified external and internal customer's needs, by implementing strategies to exceed their expectations, by effectively managing orders to meet delivery to customer specs.  Responsible for executing follow-ups with logistics partners to attend agreed process and timelines and was the focal point of company with the customer.

Analysis, Monitoring and reporting of internal controls related to customer management and reporting of all Brazilian transactions (SOX policies).

Customer Relationship Management visiting to identify needs and to increase usage of company's tools, such as e-commerce, and to prepare monthly shipping plan to Brazilian customers based on customer's forecast to be presented in sales meetings.

Monitoring and Key-user of the e-commerce tool for Latin America and being responsible for analyzing and managing the metrics for using the platform, presenting the data monthly, as well as action plans to increase the use of the tool.

Responsible for sales operation, by receiving and processing customer's purchase orders in SAP, from order to invoicing and delivery. Also responsible for issuing credit, debit, discount and rebate requests memos.

Management and planning of the stock of samples Brazil responsible for linking the current business strategy related to the sale of new products and samples; Analysis and Reporting of materials in Slow moving and definition of a plan of action together with the sales team in order to reduce this material in the inventory.

Support and monitoring in the Dupont /Chemours separation project mapping all the transactions used for sales in the SAP system, performing the tests and reporting the efficiency in the new SAP system together with the Latin America team.

Actively participated in process improvement initiatives by sharing experiences and challenges. Responsible for Internal Control reports related to customer management and sales reports in Brazil and proving support to my colleagues in Latin America region.
